scripts.date:load: export DATE_HASH=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) && sudo bash -c 'echo "DATE_HASH=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S)" >> /etc/environment' && echo "DATE_HASH SET: ${DATE_HASH}" && sed -i -e "s/DATE_HASH=.*/DATE_HASH=$DATE_HASH/" .env
scripts.prepare: npm run date:load && bash -c 'source .env && echo GET DATE_HASH: $DATE_HASH'
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run watch && npm run start:server
scripts.watch:all: concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:js"
scripts.replace:html: bash -c 'source .env && echo GET DATE_HASH: $DATE_HASH && sed -i "s/\(css\/.*\)\.[^.]*\(\.css\)/\1.$DATE_HASH\2/g" src/*.html src/templates/*.html'
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:test: npm run prebuild && npm run build:html && npm run build:css:test
scripts.build:all: npm run prebuild && npm run build:html && npm run build:html:test && npm run build:css:test && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently "npm run watch:all"
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run prepare && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint
